profile:
Paradisus Window Cleaning & House Washing Services Ltd. is a full property detailing service company based out of St. Catharines, ON. By providing Niagara, Hamilton & Halton with award-winning window cleaning, house washing, gutter cleaning, roof washing, pressure washing & spider spraying, Paradisus Window Cleaning & House Washing Services Ltd. is your premier all-in-one solution when it comes to the exterior maintenance of residential and commercial properties in Southern Ontario. We're also 100% safe to hire as we are fully insured, licensed & WSIB compliant.

Book your free / no obligation estimate with one of our property detailing specialists and start revitalizing the beauty of your home or business today!

https://www.paradisuswindowcleaning.ca/free-estimate

ALL-IN-ONE SOLUTION:

The days of collaborating with several different companies just to clean the exterior of your home are over! The process of cleaning out your gutters, washing the exterior of your house, spraying for spiders, and cleaning your windows requires a specific order of operation to be done properly and to not mess up an area already washed or sprayed. With that said, matters that are out of your control are bound to happen that can cause any company to cancel an appointment, and this generally results in a big rescheduling complication. However, when you choose Paradisus Window Cleaning & House Washing Services Ltd., you are choosing a company that specializes in full property detailing, so this means you can have everything accomplished on your exterior cleaning wish-list without the hassle of collaborating with multiple companies. Best of all, most houses can be cleaned top to bottom in just 1 day! What are you waiting for? Get your free estimate and start revitalizing the beauty of your home or business today!

Book your free / no obligation estimate with one of our property detailing specialists and start revitalizing the beauty of your home or business today! 

https://www.paradisuswindowcleaning.ca/free-estimate
products: Ladders, squeegees, scrubbers, scrappers, deionized water purification systems, soft washing systems, pressure washers, soft bristled brushes, algaecides, antiviral cleaning agents & the best pesticide available that licensed exterminators can buy in Canada!
